title: The 13 Unluckiest Breaks in Golf History
headline: The 13 Unluckiest Breaks in Golf History
description: If it weren’t for bad luck, some players say, they would have no luck at all. Yet Lady Luck has played a role in tournament golf since Day 1. Here are the 13 unluckiest breaks in golf history.
short_headline: The 13 Unluckiest Breaks in Golf History
page_title: The 13 Unluckiest Breaks in Golf History
slug: The 13 Unluckiest Breaks in Golf History
body: If it weren’t for bad luck, some players say, they would have no luck at all. Yet Lady Luck has played a role in tournament golf since Day 1. Here are the 13 unluckiest breaks in golf history.
